concept.label: Romania international rugby union player
concept.definition: "Romania international rugby union player" refers to a rugby union athlete who is recognized by the Romanian Rugby Federation as qualified to represent Romania in international rugby union matches and tournaments. This individual typically possesses a high level of skill and expertise in the sport, having met the selection criteria set forth by the governing body. Furthermore, they must either be of Romanian origin or have fulfilled the necessary residency requirements.
